com.appglu.impl
Class AppGluTemplate

java.lang.Object
  com.appglu.impl.AppGluTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppGluOperations, AsyncAppGluOperations
public class AppGluTemplate
extends Object
implements AppGluOperations, AsyncAppGluOperations

The central class for AppGlu Java Client SDK.

This is always going to be the starting point for doing anything with the AppGlu Java Client SDK.
To initialized it, you will need your credentials to authenticate your account with AppGlu:

AppGluTemplate appGluTemplate = new AppGluTemplate("appKey", "appSecret");

After AppGluTemplate is initialized you will have access to AppGlu operations classes. See the table below:

Synchronous OperationsAsynchronous OperationsAPI class description
crudOperations()asyncCrudOperations()CrudOperations contains create, read, update and delete operations to be applied on your tables
savedQueriesOperations()asyncSavedQueriesOperations()SavedQueriesOperations allow you to run your previously created SQLs on AppGlu and obtain the results
pushOperations()asyncPushOperations()PushOperations is used to register / unregister the device making it eligible to receive push notifications
analyticsOperations()asyncAnalyticsOperations()AnalyticsOperations is used to log events to AppGlu allowing it to collect mobile app usage statistics
userOperations()asyncUserOperations()UserOperations has methods to login / logout and sign up new mobile app users
syncOperations()asyncSyncOperations()SyncOperations is used to synchronize the data in your local SQLite tables with the AppGlu server
storageOperations()asyncStorageOperations()StorageOperations has methods to download and cache files from AppGlu server

Since:
1.0.0

protected  void configureHttpRequestInterceptors(List<org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpRequestInterceptor> interceptors)
          Extension point to configure or add request interceptors (implementations of ClientHttpRequestInterceptor).
Remember to call super.configureHttpRequestInterceptors(interceptors) if you override this method.
protected  org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpRequestFactory createClientHttpRequestFactory()
          Extension point to replace or customize the HTTP client library.
If you replace the default HTTP client, please remember to override shouldAddGzipRequestInterceptor() and return true if this library do not add GZip support by default.
Apache Http Commons (HttpComponentsClientHttpRequestFactory) is supported as well as the standard JSE HttpURLConnection (SimpleClientHttpRequestFactory).
protected  org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageConverter<Object> createJsonMessageConverter()
          Extension point to replace or customize the JSON parser library.
If you replace or customize the default JSON library please remember to do it as well on createTableChangesJsonParser().
For now, Jackson JSON parser library is the only JSON parser supported.
protected  TableChangesJsonParser createTableChangesJsonParser()
          Extension point to replace or customize the JSON parser library.
If you replace or customize the default JSON library, please remember to do it as well on createJsonMessageConverter().
For now, Jackson JSON parser library is the only JSON parser supported.

Constructor Detail

AppGluTemplate

public AppGluTemplate(String applicationKey,
                      String applicationSecret)
Parameters:
applicationKey - a randomly generated unique key specific for each mobile application
applicationSecret - the secret key used to authenticate this application

AppGluTemplate

public AppGluTemplate(String applicationKey,
                      String applicationSecret,
                      String applicationEnvironment)
Parameters:
applicationKey - a randomly generated unique key specific for each mobile application
applicationSecret - the secret key used to authenticate this application
applicationEnvironment - environment name to be accessed on the AppGlu server. Normally set to PRODUCTION_ENVIRONMENT or STAGING_ENVIRONMENT, if not set PRODUCTION_ENVIRONMENT is assumed

AppGluTemplate

public AppGluTemplate(String applicationKey,
                      String applicationSecret,
                      String applicationEnvironment,
                      String baseUrl)
Parameters:
applicationKey - a randomly generated unique key specific for each mobile application
applicationSecret - the secret key used to authenticate this application
applicationEnvironment - environment name to be accessed on the AppGlu server. Normally set to PRODUCTION_ENVIRONMENT or STAGING_ENVIRONMENT, if not set PRODUCTION_ENVIRONMENT is assumed
baseUrl - the server URL to point to, if different from the default DEFAULT_BASE_URL

createJsonMessageConverter

protected org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageConverter<Object> createJsonMessageConverter()
Extension point to replace or customize the JSON parser library.
If you replace or customize the default JSON library please remember to do it as well on createTableChangesJsonParser().
For now, Jackson JSON parser library is the only JSON parser supported.

See Also:
JsonMessageConverterSelector, createTableChangesJsonParser()

createTableChangesJsonParser

protected TableChangesJsonParser createTableChangesJsonParser()
Extension point to replace or customize the JSON parser library.
If you replace or customize the default JSON library, please remember to do it as well on createJsonMessageConverter().
For now, Jackson JSON parser library is the only JSON parser supported.

See Also:
JsonMessageConverterSelector, createJsonMessageConverter()

createClientHttpRequestFactory

protected org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpRequestFactory createClientHttpRequestFactory()
Extension point to replace or customize the HTTP client library.
If you replace the default HTTP client, please remember to override shouldAddGzipRequestInterceptor() and return true if this library do not add GZip support by default.
Apache Http Commons (HttpComponentsClientHttpRequestFactory) is supported as well as the standard JSE HttpURLConnection (SimpleClientHttpRequestFactory).

See Also:
createClientHttpRequestFactory, shouldAddGzipRequestInterceptor()

shouldAddGzipRequestInterceptor

protected boolean shouldAddGzipRequestInterceptor()
Extension point to override if you changed the HTTP client by overriding createClientHttpRequestFactory().
Return true if this library do not add GZip support by default.

See Also:
createClientHttpRequestFactory, createClientHttpRequestFactory()

configureHttpRequestInterceptors

protected void configureHttpRequestInterceptors(List<org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpRequestInterceptor> interceptors)
Extension point to configure or add request interceptors (implementations of ClientHttpRequestInterceptor).
Remember to call super.configureHttpRequestInterceptors(interceptors) if you override this method.
